EmailTemplate.name: Tech Forum 2021.Invitation 1 Dormant - NON US.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell BEYOND Registration Now Open!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You're invited to make the future yours.
Back by popular demand! Honeywell BEYOND Tech Forum 2021 kicks off a new round of thought leadership from across the globe.
Our second virtual symposium focuses on the future of business, its toughest challenges and the innovation and technology powering solutions for today and tomorrow.
Come for the Keynote, Stay for the Session
Thought leaders and C-suite executives join forces to unpackÂ seven topics:
- Digital Transformation <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/digital-transformation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]> - Innovation <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/innovation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]> - The Next Normal <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/the-next-normal?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]> - Safety and Security <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/safety-security?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]> - Supply Chain <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/supply-chain?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]> - Healthcare <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/health-care?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]> - Sustainability and Energy Management <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en/topics/sustainability?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]>
Take the reins of your most vexing business challenges and find solutions that go beyond, at Honeywell BEYOND.
REGISTER <[[https://events.honeywell.com/us/en?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_Hon_Corp_Tech_Forum&utm_term=aero&utm_content=aero]]>
